data.comment: Kick-off has been delayed.
Today's referee, Ismail Elfath, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 1, Miami have a goal kick.
Ismail Elfath signals a Miami throw-in in Nashville's half.
Miami have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 2, Throw-in high up the field for Miami in Nashville.
Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Miami at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Nashville in the half of Miami.
Dylan Nealis (Miami) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 6, Ismail Elfath awards Miami a goal kick.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 8, Nashville are caught offside.
Throw-in Miami.
Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 9, In Nashville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 12, Can Nashville capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Throw-in for Nashville in their own half.
Goal! Randall Leal gives Nashville a 1-0 lead in Nashville.
In the minute 14, Great play from Alex Muyl to set up the goal.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Nashville.
Ball goes out of play for a Miami goal kick.
In the minute 18, Ismail Elfath awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Nashville in the half of Miami.
Free kick Nashville.
In the minute 22, An attacking Nashville player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nashville.
Goal! The home team extend their lead to 2-0 thanks to a penalty from Hany Mukhtar.
In the minute 25, Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ismail Elfath awards the home team a throw-in.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Nashville to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
Free kick for Miami in the half of Nashville.
Alistair Johnston (Nashville) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 31, Goal kick for Nashville at Nissan Stadium.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Nashville.
Wil Trapp is booked for the away team.
In the minute 33, In Nashville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The away team replace Dylan Nealis with Matias Pellegrini.
Corner awarded to Miami.
In the minute 34, Can Miami get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nashville's half?
Free kick Miami.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
In the minute 38, In Nashville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Miami in the half of Nashville.
Nashville have a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Free kick Miami.
Throw-in for Nashville at Nissan Stadium.
Throw-in for Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 43, Miami to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nashville.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Nashville.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Miami in the half of Nashville.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Miami get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nashville's half?
In the minute 48, Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Miami are coming forward and Matias Pellegrini gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ismail Elfath awards Nashville a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Alvas Powell for Miami drives towards goal at Nissan Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Miami.
Goal kick for Nashville at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 51, Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ismail Elfath signals a throw-in for Miami, close to Nashville's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Nashville goal kick.
In the minute 54, Throw-in Miami.
Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
In the minute 55, Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Nashville take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Dax McCarty.
In the minute 58, Free kick Miami.
Can Miami capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nashville's half?
Nashville have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
In the minute 60, Ismail Elfath signals a Nashville throw-in in Miami's half.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Miami just outside Nashville's area.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
In the minute 63, Diego Alonso (Miami) is making a second substitution, with Julian Carranza replacing Juan Agudelo.
Victor Ulloa is on a sub for Wil Trapp for Miami.
In the minute 64, Ismail Elfath awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Nashville.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Miami.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Miami.
Miami's Rodolfo Pizarro misses with an attempt on goal.
Ismail Elfath awards Nashville a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Derrick Jones is replacing Hany Mukhtar for Nashville at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Miami in the half of Nashville.
The home team have replaced Randall Leal with Handwalla Bwana. This is the second substitution made today by Gary Smith.
Daniel Rios is replacing Jhonder Cadiz for the home team.
Miami to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 72, Nashville have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Can Miami get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nashville's half?
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Anibal Godoy.
In the minute 74, Gary Smith is making the team's fourth substitution at Nissan Stadium with Brian Anunga replacing Anibal Godoy.
Miami make their fourth substitution with Ben Sweat replacing Mikey Ambrose.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Nashville at Nissan Stadium.
Throw-in for Miami in the half of Nashville.
Ismail Elfath signals a Miami throw-in in Nashville's half.
In the minute 78, Miami are in shooting range from this free kick.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Nashville Nashville attack through Daniel Lovitz. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a Miami goal kick.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Nashville to check on Alex Muyl, who is grimacing with pain.
Taylor Washington is on a sub for Alex Muyl for Nashville.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Nashville in the half of Miami.
Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
Nashville drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 83, Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nashville.
Can Miami get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nashville's half?
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Nashville in their own half.
Goal kick for Miami at Nissan Stadium.
In Nashville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 88, Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Nashville.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 3-0.
